pending_quotes.quote: Love at first sight is the universe's way of saying there's magic left.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the water that quenches life's thirst.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the air we breathe, invisible but essential.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the wave, ever-changing yet constant.

pending_quotes.quote: A ring is but metal; love is the promise it holds.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the cry of joy in the silence of the night.

pending_quotes.quote: Water may shape the earth, but love shapes the soul.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the cloud that carries dreams into reality.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the cry that echoes the heart's deepest desires.

pending_quotes.quote: Love is the air that lifts us above our troubles.
